name: Probabilistic Local Walks
tagline: An Accurate And Efficient Method For Detecting Protein Complexes from Protein-Protein Interaction Networks
body:
### What is PLW?
__P__robabilistic __L__ocal __W__alks (PLW) is a graph clustering algorithm,
and was designed to detect protein complexes in protein-protein interaction (PPI) networks with high accuracy and efficiency.

PLW uses a **seed selection strategy** to prioritise proteins for expansion into cores, which selects seeds with dense neighbourhoods. 

PLW also uses a topological measure called **common neighbour similarity** to estimate the functional similarity of two proteins in order to weigh the unweighted network.
Additionally, you are allowed to supply your own similarity graph in the format of an edge list via a command-line option.

The core mining algorithm runs in **O(|V| log |V| + |E|)** time, where |V| is the number of vertices and |E| is the number of edges.

### Supplementary Materials
* Full results for performance evaluations
    * [DIP / CYC2008](http://fi-de.net/research/PLW/results/dip_cyc2008_20130429-1707.pdf)
    * [COMBINED6 / CYC2008](http://fi-de.net/research/PLW/results/combined6_cyc2008_20130502-0728.pdf)
    * [DIP / NEWMIPS](http://fi-de.net/research/PLW/results/dip_newmips_20130501-2131.pdf)
    * [COMBINED6 / NEWMIPS](http://fi-de.net/research/PLW/results/combined6_newmips_20130502-0728.pdf)
* [Predicted protein complexes](http://fi-de.net/research/PLW/predictedComplexes.zip)
* [ZIP file containing Mac OS X binaries and sample data](http://fi-de.net/research/PLW/PLW+inputData.zip) (Windows binaries to be uploaded)
* [PPI Datasets Used](https://github.com/wonglkd/PLW/tree/master-input/inputData): [.tar.gz](https://github.com/wonglkd/PLW/tarball/master-input)|[.zip](https://github.com/wonglkd/PLW/zipball/master-input)
    * [DIP (Database of Interacting Proteins)](https://raw.github.com/wonglkd/PLW/master-input/inputData/ppi.dip.cleaned.txt)
    * [COMBINED6](https://raw.github.com/wonglkd/PLW/master-input/inputData/ppi.combined6.cleaned.txt)
* Gold Standard Benchmarks
    * [CYC2008 Catalogue](http://fi-de.net/research/PLW/referenceComplexes/cmplx.3.cyc2008.tab.txt) (Original source: [Wodak Lab](http://wodaklab.org/cyc2008/resources/CYC2008_complex.tab))
    * [NewMIPS](http://fi-de.net/research/PLW/referenceComplexes/cmplx.3.newmips.tab.txt) (Original sources: MIPS, Aloy _et al._ and SGD Database based on GO annotations)

### References
Daniel Lin-Kit Wong, Xiao-Li Li, Min Wu, Jie Zheng and See-Kiong Ng  
**PLW: Probabilistic Local Walks for Detecting Protein Complexes from Protein Interaction Networks**  
_Working Paper_

### Contact
Have a question? Drop me (Daniel) an email at <wonglkd@gmail.com> and I will be happy to answer your queries.

Found a bug? Report it on the [issue tracker](https://github.com/wonglkd/PLW/issues).
